name: AVI018 Prototyp Teaser
description:
AVI018 is a short "found footage" style teaser game for an bigger project.  I will give more info later!

I worked the last 5 days on it and then uploaded the unfinished first draft of the game because i ran out of time (Deadline GameJam).

Graphics/ Sound / Animation, etc. are not final. It is a prototyp game, focusing on atmosphere.  The file size in future revisions will be 1/4 of the original size.

I will of course continue working on it! I Update you when im ready :)
